write: Please note that while trying to copy the newly created files, it succeeded as it was with a very small size but when he tried to copy a large existing files, it hung
Is there any logs indicating this hung state and why it is happening?

There may be logs indicating the hung state when trying to copy large existing files. You should check the system logs or any error messages that were generated during the copying process. The hang could be happening due to various reasons such as lack of disk space, network congestion, hardware issues, or software bugs. It is recommended to investigate the specific error messages or logs to determine the root cause of the hang.
